actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-847.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: An Act to provide the Secretary of the Interior to make payments to appropriate school districts to assist in providing educational facilities and services for persons living within or near the Grand Canyon National Park on nontaxable Federal lands, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-847) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make payments to reimburse the appropriate school districts for educational facilities and services provided to pupils living at or near the Grant Canyon National Park on United States property which is not subject to taxation by the State or local agencies. Directs the Secretary to submit an annual estimate of such anticipated payments to the appropriate committees of the Senate and the House of Representatives. Authorizes the appropriation of $1,500,000 for fiscal year 1979 and $1,500,000 for each succeeding fiscal year to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer franchise fees received from certain concession operations at Grand Canyon National Park, Ariz., to the Grand Canyon Unified School District, Ariz.

An Act to provide the Secretary of the Interior to make payments to appropriate school districts to assist in providing educational facilities and services for persons living within or near the Grand Canyon National Park on nontaxable Federal lands, and for other purposes.
